*local-provider-config*constant
(defconst *local-provider-config*
  (make-llm-provider-config :provider (llm-provider-local)
    :endpoint *lm-studio-endpoint*
    :api-key ""
    :model ""
    :org-id ""))
serialize-chat-messagefunction
(defun serialize-chat-message
  (msg)
  (declare (xargs :guard (chat-message-p msg))
    (ignore msg))
  (prog2$ (er hard?
      'serialize-chat-message
      "Raw Lisp definition not installed?")
    "{}"))

(defthm stringp-of-serialize-chat-message
  (stringp (serialize-chat-message msg)))

acl2-safe-chars-pfunction
(defun acl2-safe-chars-p
  (chars)
  "Check if all characters in list have char-code <= 255."
  (declare (xargs :guard (character-listp chars)))
  (if (endp chars)
    t
    (and (< (char-code (car chars)) 256)
      (acl2-safe-chars-p (cdr chars)))))
booleanp-of-acl2-safe-chars-ptheorem
(defthm booleanp-of-acl2-safe-chars-p
  (booleanp (acl2-safe-chars-p chars))
  :rule-classes :type-prescription)
acl2-safe-string-pfunction
(defun acl2-safe-string-p
  (s)
  "A string is ACL2-safe if all its characters have char-code <= 255."
  (declare (xargs :guard (stringp s)))
  (if (not (stringp s))
    nil
    (acl2-safe-chars-p (coerce s 'list))))
booleanp-of-acl2-safe-string-ptheorem
(defthm booleanp-of-acl2-safe-string-p
  (booleanp (acl2-safe-string-p s))
  :rule-classes :type-prescription)
http-success-pfunction
(defun http-success-p
  (status)
  (declare (xargs :guard (natp status)))
  (and (>= status 200) (< status 300)))
booleanp-of-http-success-ptheorem
(defthm booleanp-of-http-success-p
  (booleanp (http-success-p status))
  :rule-classes :type-prescription)
llm-chat-completionfunction
(defun llm-chat-completion
  (model messages state)
  (declare (xargs :guard (and (stringp model) (chat-message-list-p messages))
      :stobjs state
      :guard-hints (("Goal" :in-theory (disable post-json)))))
  (b* ((request-json (serialize-chat-request model messages)) (headers '(("Content-Type" . "application/json; charset=utf-8") ("Accept" . "application/json")))
      ((mv err response-body status-raw state) (post-json *lm-studio-endpoint*
          request-json
          headers
          *llm-connect-timeout*
          *llm-read-timeout*
          state))
      (status (mbe :logic (nfix status-raw) :exec status-raw))
      ((when err) (mv err "" state))
      ((unless (http-success-p status)) (mv (concatenate 'string
            "HTTP error: status "
            (coerce (explode-nonnegative-integer status 10 nil) 'string))
          ""
          state))
      (content (parse-chat-response response-body)))
    (mv nil content state)))
stringp-of-llm-chat-completion-responsetheorem
(defthm stringp-of-llm-chat-completion-response
  (stringp (mv-nth 1 (llm-chat-completion model messages state))))
state-p1-of-llm-chat-completiontheorem
(defthm state-p1-of-llm-chat-completion
  (implies (state-p1 state)
    (state-p1 (mv-nth 2 (llm-chat-completion model messages state)))))
make-provider-headersfunction
(defun make-provider-headers
  (config)
  (declare (xargs :guard (llm-provider-config-p config)))
  (let* ((api-key (llm-provider-config->api-key config)) (org-id (llm-provider-config->org-id config))
      (base-headers '(("Content-Type" . "application/json; charset=utf-8") ("Accept" . "application/json"))))
    (cond ((equal api-key "") base-headers)
      (t (let ((auth-headers (cons (cons "Authorization"
                 (concatenate 'string "Bearer " api-key))
               base-headers)))
          (if (equal org-id "")
            auth-headers
            (cons (cons "OpenAI-Organization" org-id) auth-headers)))))))
alistp-of-make-provider-headerstheorem
(defthm alistp-of-make-provider-headers
  (alistp (make-provider-headers config)))
llm-chat-completion-with-providerfunction
(defun llm-chat-completion-with-provider
  (config messages state)
  (declare (xargs :guard (and (llm-provider-config-p config)
        (chat-message-list-p messages))
      :stobjs state
      :guard-hints (("Goal" :in-theory (disable post-json)))))
  (b* ((endpoint (llm-provider-config->endpoint config)) (model (llm-provider-config->model config))
      ((when (equal endpoint "")) (mv "Provider config missing endpoint" "" state))
      ((when (equal model "")) (mv "Provider config missing model" "" state))
      ((when (and (provider-requires-api-key-p config)
           (equal (llm-provider-config->api-key config) ""))) (mv "Provider requires API key but none configured"
          ""
          state))
      (request-json (serialize-chat-request model messages))
      (headers (make-provider-headers config))
      ((mv err response-body status-raw state) (post-json endpoint
          request-json
          headers
          *llm-connect-timeout*
          *llm-read-timeout*
          state))
      (status (mbe :logic (nfix status-raw) :exec status-raw))
      ((when err) (mv err "" state))
      ((unless (http-success-p status)) (mv (concatenate 'string
            "HTTP error: status "
            (coerce (explode-nonnegative-integer status 10 nil) 'string))
          ""
          state))
      (content (parse-chat-response response-body)))
    (mv nil content state)))
stringp-of-llm-chat-completion-with-provider-responsetheorem
(defthm stringp-of-llm-chat-completion-with-provider-response
  (stringp (mv-nth 1
      (llm-chat-completion-with-provider config messages state))))
state-p1-of-llm-chat-completion-with-providertheorem
(defthm state-p1-of-llm-chat-completion-with-provider
  (implies (state-p1 state)
    (state-p1 (mv-nth 2
        (llm-chat-completion-with-provider config messages state)))))
*default-max-tokens*constant
(defconst *default-max-tokens* 2048)
llm-completions-with-providerfunction
(defun llm-completions-with-provider
  (config messages max-tokens state)
  (declare (xargs :guard (and (llm-provider-config-p config)
        (chat-message-list-p messages)
        (natp max-tokens))
      :stobjs state
      :guard-hints (("Goal" :in-theory (disable post-json)))))
  (b* ((model (llm-provider-config->model config)) (endpoint *openai-completions-endpoint*)
      ((when (equal model "")) (mv "Provider config missing model" "" state))
      ((when (and (provider-requires-api-key-p config)
           (equal (llm-provider-config->api-key config) ""))) (mv "Provider requires API key but none configured"
          ""
          state))
      (request-json (serialize-completions-request model messages max-tokens))
      (headers (make-provider-headers config))
      ((mv err response-body status-raw state) (post-json endpoint
          request-json
          headers
          *llm-connect-timeout*
          *llm-read-timeout*
          state))
      (status (mbe :logic (nfix status-raw) :exec status-raw))
      ((when err) (mv err "" state))
      ((unless (http-success-p status)) (mv (concatenate 'string
            "HTTP error: status "
            (coerce (explode-nonnegative-integer status 10 nil) 'string)
            " - "
            response-body)
          ""
          state))
      (content (parse-completions-response response-body)))
    (mv nil content state)))
stringp-of-llm-completions-with-provider-responsetheorem
(defthm stringp-of-llm-completions-with-provider-response
  (stringp (mv-nth 1
      (llm-completions-with-provider config
        messages
        max-tokens
        state))))
state-p1-of-llm-completions-with-providertheorem
(defthm state-p1-of-llm-completions-with-provider
  (implies (state-p1 state)
    (state-p1 (mv-nth 2
        (llm-completions-with-provider config
          messages
          max-tokens
          state)))))
llm-list-modelsfunction
(defun llm-list-models
  (state)
  (declare (xargs :stobjs state))
  (b* ((headers '(("Accept" . "application/json"))) ((mv err response-body status-raw state) (get-json *lm-studio-models-endpoint*
          headers
          *llm-connect-timeout*
          *llm-read-timeout*
          state))
      (status (mbe :logic (nfix status-raw) :exec status-raw))
      ((when err) (mv err nil state))
      ((unless (http-success-p status)) (mv (concatenate 'string
            "HTTP error: status "
            (coerce (explode-nonnegative-integer status 10 nil) 'string))
          nil
          state))
      (models (parse-models-response response-body)))
    (mv nil models state)))
string-listp-of-llm-list-models-modelstheorem
(defthm string-listp-of-llm-list-models-models
  (string-listp (mv-nth 1 (llm-list-models state))))
state-p1-of-llm-list-modelstheorem
(defthm state-p1-of-llm-list-models
  (implies (state-p1 state)
    (state-p1 (mv-nth 2 (llm-list-models state)))))
llm-list-models-fullfunction
(defun llm-list-models-full
  (state)
  (declare (xargs :stobjs state))
  (b* ((headers '(("Accept" . "application/json"))) ((mv err response-body status-raw state) (get-json *lm-studio-v0-models-endpoint*
          headers
          *llm-connect-timeout*
          *llm-read-timeout*
          state))
      (status (mbe :logic (nfix status-raw) :exec status-raw))
      ((when err) (mv err nil state))
      ((unless (http-success-p status)) (mv (concatenate 'string
            "HTTP error: status "
            (coerce (explode-nonnegative-integer status 10 nil) 'string))
          nil
          state))
      (models (parse-v0-models-response response-body)))
    (mv nil models state)))
model-info-list-p-of-llm-list-models-full-modelstheorem
(defthm model-info-list-p-of-llm-list-models-full-models
  (model-info-list-p (mv-nth 1 (llm-list-models-full state))))

(defthm state-p1-of-llm-list-models-full
  (implies (state-p1 state)
    (state-p1 (mv-nth 2 (llm-list-models-full state)))))
model-matches-pref-pfunction
(defun model-matches-pref-p
  (model-id pref)
  (declare (xargs :guard (and (stringp model-id) (stringp pref))))
  (search pref model-id))
